Reviews.Title: Good phone!
Reviews.Author: Abm2485
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone used and it works great! I had to get an sd card and car charger as it did not come with it. The ETC came with the Droid 2.1 OS. Since there was no contract, I rooted it and installed Cyanogenmod, upped the CPU, and it works AMAZING. So, in short if you're going to buy a phone that's already "no contract" why not tinker with it and get it working better!

Reviews.Title: my husband love this phone
Reviews.Author: Beverly G.
Reviews.Content: i got this phone for myself an was happy with it but the letter size on the screen was to small for me so i gave it to my husband an he loves it. it arrived earlier than date given. great job seller, i will order from this seller again

Reviews.Title: It works great
Reviews.Author: Ktbug
Reviews.Content: It arrived fast it was in good shape. I liked the price  works really good havnr had a problem with it

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Debby
Reviews.Content: This phone is not what I expected from a Smartphone.  The battery needs to be charged every two hours if you are searching the web for any length of time. On a normal day it needs to be charged in the middle of the day, so carry a charger with you. You can get a full day out of it if you just use it as a simple phone and don't use the sync, wi-fi, web, etc.  Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: OMG
Reviews.Author: sa
Reviews.Content: I am not a person who likes to write review something. But, I have to say that! please do not buy this item. There is no SD card and there is no USB charger (only have Wall charger). I asked to seller to send these items to me but..anyway, it is hard to believe this item and seller.

Reviews.Content: i might get it in two weeks but is it capable with prepaid wirelessfor verizon becuz i want this phone bad if its capable
